data.title: myRadex: Radex with a twist
data.name: myRadex
data.description: Similar to radex, with a different way to solve the statistical equilibrium problem

evidence: "To use this code, you first need to compile it using the `makefile` (the executable is named `my_radex`) by running `make` in the command line, then edit the configuration file (`configure.dat`) to meet your needs.  After this execute the command `./my_radex configure.dat` and you will get the results."

"This code solves essentially the same problem as `RADEX` ... except that we take a different approach to solve the statistical equilibrium problem. Given an initial distribution, what we do is to evolve the system towards equilibrium using an ODE solver."
